mapper.select: select pro_no , work_parent_no, work_no , work_status, work_title, work_content, work_first, work_prog, work_date, work_startdate, work_enddate from works where pro_no = #{proNo}

WITH OrderedWorks AS ( SELECT WORK_NO, PRO_NO, WORK_STATUS, WORK_TITLE, WORK_CONTENT, WORK_FIRST, WORK_DATE, WORK_STARTDATE, WORK_ENDDATE, WORK_PROG, WORK_PARENT_NO, WORK_CNT as worksCnt FROM works WHERE pro_no = #{proNo} ) SELECT ow.WORK_NO, ow.PRO_NO, ow.WORK_STATUS, ow.WORK_TITLE, ow.WORK_CONTENT, ow.WORK_FIRST, ow.WORK_DATE, ow.WORK_STARTDATE, ow.WORK_ENDDATE, ow.WORK_PROG, ow.WORK_PARENT_NO, ow.worksCnt FROM OrderedWorks ow LEFT JOIN OrderedWorks parent ON ow.WORK_PARENT_NO = parent.WORK_NO ORDER BY COALESCE(parent.WORK_NO, ow.WORK_NO), ow.WORK_NO

select W.WORK_NO ,W.PRO_NO ,W.WORK_STATUS ,W.WORK_TITLE ,W.WORK_CONTENT ,W.WORK_FIRST ,W.WORK_DATE ,W.WORK_STARTDATE ,W.WORK_ENDDATE ,W.WORK_PROG ,W.WORK_PARENT_NO ,W.WORK_CNT as worksCnt from works W where work_no = #{workNo}
select manager_no, work_no, emp_no from manager where work_no = #{workNo}

select e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_id, e.position_no, e.emp_profileimg
from employee e left outer join manager m on(m.emp_no = e.emp_no) where m.work_no = #{workNo}
select pro_name from projects where pro_no = #{proNo}
